_description: Resolutions for ICE (Internal Consistency Evaluators) and WiX validation rules

resolutions.resolution: No action needed - this is a test ICE to verify validation is working.
Remove circular file references. Check the File table for self-referencing entries.
Fix data type mismatches. Ensure integers are in valid ranges and identifiers follow naming rules (max 72 chars, alphanumeric + underscore).
Correct sequence numbers. Standard actions use ranges 1-1499 (Before), 1500-2500 (During), 2501+ (After). Custom actions must fit appropriately.
Fix Class table entries. Ensure unique CLSIDs per component and valid Context column values (LocalServer, LocalServer32, InprocServer, InprocServer32).
Correct column definitions to match _Validation table. Check data types, nullable settings, and value constraints.
Install fonts to FontsFolder only. Move font files to a component targeting [FontsFolder].
Set valid KeyPath. Reference a File or Registry entry within the component. At least one resource must be the KeyPath.
Don't use system directories as custom directories. Use StandardDirectory references instead of redefining SystemFolder, WindowsFolder, etc.
Remove UI actions from AdvtExecuteSequence. Advertisement runs silently; use InstallExecuteSequence for UI.
Resize dialog controls to fit within dialog boundaries. Check X, Y, Width, Height attributes.
Use valid custom action type. Type must be 1-54 for standard types. Check combination of source/target flags.
Add required attributes to controls. CheckBox needs Property, RadioButtonGroup needs Property, etc.
Fix feature parent references. Parent feature must exist and cannot create circular references.
Add Extension entry for each MIME type. Every MIME entry needs a corresponding Extension table entry.
Set ProductCode to valid GUID format: {8-4-4-4-12} with uppercase hex digits and braces.
Fix PushButton control events. ControlEvent entries must reference valid events (NewDialog, DoAction, SetProperty, etc.).
Add CreateFolder entry when KeyPath is a directory. Components with directory KeyPath need CreateFolder for the same directory.
Fix AdvtExecuteSequence references. Actions in advertise sequence must be valid advertise-capable actions.
Add required dialog controls: Next, Back, Cancel buttons and required text elements as specified in _Validation.
Assign unique ComponentId GUID to each component. Never reuse GUIDs across components.
Fix FeatureComponents references. Both Feature and Component entries must exist in their respective tables.
Fix dialog tab order. TabIndex values should be sequential starting from 0 with no gaps.
Rename property to avoid reserved names. Don't use INSTALLLOCATION, etc. without understanding implications.
Merge module validation. Dependencies and exclusions must reference valid merge modules.
Fix required action conditions. Certain standard actions require specific conditions.
Fix Component conditions. Avoid component conditions that could orphan files.
ForceReboot action must be properly sequenced. Place after InstallFinalize in execute sequence.
Fix stream name conflicts. Binary and Icon names must not conflict with internal stream names.
Correct file sequence numbers. Files in same cabinet must have contiguous sequence numbers.
Fix control text length. Text must not exceed maximum allowed length.
Fix directory parent references. Directory parent must exist or be null for root.
Fix registry key path format. Use proper format: [1-6]\path\key for registry roots.
Fix RadioButton validation. All buttons in group must have same Property.
Fix cabinet name format. Cabinet names must follow 8.3 or specific naming rules.
Fix icon reference. Icons must exist in Icon or Binary table.
Fix component GUID. Each non-empty component needs a valid GUID (or use Guid='*' for auto-generation).
Fix Summary Information. Required summary stream properties must be present and valid.
Fix miscellaneous validation errors as indicated in the specific message.
Fix extension references. Extension table entries must match ProgId references.
Fix shortcut icon. Shortcut Icon must reference valid Icon table entry.
Fix component self-referencing. Component references must not create cycles.
Fix dialog bitmap. DialogBitmap control must reference valid Binary table entry.
Fix LockPermissions table. Entries must reference valid domains and use proper SID format.
Fix custom action target. Property or key path must exist and be properly formatted.
Fix feature parent. Each feature can have only one parent (or none for root features).
Fix directory with file reference. Files must reference existing directories.
Fix RegLocator table. Entries must have valid root, key, and name fields.
Fix shortcut/icon references. Icon must exist in Icon table and match ARPPRODUCTICON.
Fix font entry. Font table TrueType column must be null or valid font name.
Private properties in AppSearch. Public property names must be uppercase.
Fix registry value format. Registry values must use proper null-delimited format.
Fix companions file sequence. Companion file sequence must match parent file.
Fix LockPermissions object. Object must be file, registry key, or create folder entry.
Fix directory depth. Directory structure cannot exceed 32 levels.
Fix component per-user/per-machine. Component cannot mix per-user and per-machine resources.
Fix media layout. Media table must include all required cabinets.
Fix advertised shortcut. Advertised shortcuts need valid Feature reference.
Fix file version. File version must be in proper format.
Fix upgrade table. UpgradeCode references must be valid GUIDs.
Fix isolated components. Application and component must be in same feature.
Fix RemoveFile. RemoveFile entries need valid directory and file references.
Fix directory property. Directory property must exist in Directory table.
Fix environment variable. Environment table entries must have valid format.
Fix SQL custom action. ODBCDataSource validation.
Fix target path. TargetPath for non-advertised shortcuts must resolve to valid path.
Fix global assembly. Assemblies with processor architecture must be in matching directories.
Fix reserved bits. Attribute columns must not use reserved bit values.
Fix integer column. Integer value exceeds maximum allowed.
Fix MIME content type. ContentType must follow MIME format.
Fix custom action flag. Invalid custom action flag combination.
Fix package code. PackageCode must be a valid GUID.
Fix FASTOEM property. Only for OEM installations.
Fix custom action DLL. DLL custom actions must specify valid entry point.
Fix reserved words. Don't use reserved words as identifiers.
Fix per-user installs. OLE registration requires per-machine install.
Fix AdvtUISequence. Advertise UI sequence should be empty for silent operation.
Fix duplicate component references. Same component should not be in same feature twice.
Fix admin/install sequence action. Action must be in proper sequence for install type.
Fix minor upgrade validation. Minor upgrades have specific constraints.
Fix install level. InstallLevel must be positive integer.
Fix MsiAssembly table. Assembly file must exist and have valid attributes.
Fix sequence action reference. Referenced action must exist in sequence table.
Fix nested installation. Nested installs need special configuration.
Fix registry ACL. ModuleSignature validation for merge modules.
Fix COM registration. Class, TypeLib entries need valid component references.
Fix directory table. Directory table must have exactly one root entry.
Fix validation for ProgId advertisement. Check Class and Extension tables.
Fix shortcut directory. Shortcuts must target existing directories.
Fix file hash. FileHash must match file content for unversioned files.
Fix component on fixed/removable drive. Check component destination logic.
Fix custom action security. Type 2 (DLL) custom actions should avoid elevated execution when not needed.
Fix global assembly cache install. GAC components need proper configuration.
Fix control overlap. Dialog controls must not overlap.
Fix PublishComponent. Published component requires valid qualifier.
Fix component location. Two components should not install same file to same location.
Fix hyphenated identifier. Avoid hyphens in identifiers where not allowed.
Fix directory name. Directory name must not contain invalid characters.
Fix CreateFolder. CreateFolder must reference valid directory in component.
Fix isolated component DLL. IsolatedComponent shared DLL validation.
Fix assembly identity. Use consistent strong name for assemblies.
Fix nested install validation. Review nested install requirements.
Review system folder components. Installing to system folders requires careful consideration.
Fix SelfReg module. Ensure proper sequencing before SelfRegModules.
Review bootstrapper application configuration. Ensure BootstrapperApplication element is properly configured.
Fix BA theme path. Ensure theme XML file exists and is valid.
Add localization files for BA. Create wxl files for all supported cultures.
Add missing BA resource file. Check resource paths and ensure files exist.
Configure license file properly. Use LicenseUrl or LicenseFile on WixStandardBootstrapperApplication.
Fix BA configuration attributes. Review all BA element attributes for validity.
Fix prerequisite package. Ensure prerequisite packages are properly authored.
Ensure BA DLL exists. Check SourceFile path for BootstrapperApplication.
Review overridable variable usage. Variable overrides must match declared variables.
Fix BA condition. Review condition syntax and referenced variables.
Fix bundle configuration. Check Bundle element and all required attributes.
Review package warnings. Check all package references are valid.
Fix chain configuration. Ensure Chain element contains valid packages.
Review variable warnings. Check variable names and values.
Fix payload configuration. Ensure all payloads are properly referenced.
Fix bundle validation error. Review Bundle authoring for errors.
Fix package configuration. Ensure package attributes are valid.
Fix chain error. Review Chain structure and package ordering.
Fix variable configuration. Review variable declarations and usage.
Fix payload error. Check payload SourceFile and other attributes.
Fix candle/light error. Review the specific error message for details.
Unresolved reference. Add the missing fragment or include the referenced file.
ICE validation failed. Address the specific ICE error mentioned.
Linker error. Check file references and library paths.
Linker warning. Review warning and address if needed.
ICE reference error. The ICE validator found an issue - review the ICE code.
Expected condition error. Add required condition to element.
Fix WiX authoring error. Review XML for correct syntax.
Schema validation error. Ensure XML matches WiX schema.
Undefined preprocessor variable. Define the variable or remove the reference.
Candle error. Check source file syntax and paths.
Element not supported. The element may be deprecated or require an extension.
Found orphaned element. Ensure element is properly nested.
General WiX error. Review error message for specific guidance.
WiX warning. Consider addressing the warning to improve package quality.
WiX extension error. Ensure extension is installed and configured correctly.
WiX configuration error. Check project configuration files.
Util extension error. Review Util element configuration.
SQL extension error. Review SqlDatabase and SqlScript configuration.
IIS extension error. Review WebSite, WebApplication configuration.
NetFx extension error. Review .NET framework prerequisite configuration.
Firewall extension error. Review FirewallException configuration.
HTTP extension error. Review URL reservation configuration.
Extension error. Review extension-specific configuration.
Validation error. Review the specific validation message.
Validation warning. Consider addressing to improve package quality.
Smoke test error. The installer failed basic validation tests.
Smoke test failure. Review smoke test results for specifics.
Merge module ICE error. Review merge module authoring.
Merge module validation. Check module dependencies and exports.
Merge module component error. Fix component identifiers in module.
Merge module directory error. Directory references must be valid.
Module substitution error. Check ModuleSubstitution table.
Module configuration error. Review ModuleConfiguration table.
Module signature error. Ensure ModuleSignature is valid.
Module exclusion error. Fix ModuleExclusion table entries.
Module dependency error. Ensure referenced modules are available.
